title: Near Death Experiences - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/4/17
itunes:title: Near Death Experiences - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/4/17
description:
George Noory and metaphysician Dr. Linda Salvin discuss her various near death experiences, including surviving plane and car crashes, examine the true definition of death, as well as her work as a consultant on the new movie "Flatliners."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
